Phase Info [01-088-9168] Hydrotalcite ● (Mg0.75Al0.25(OH)2)((CO3)0.125)
Name: Hydrotalcite
Formula: (Mg0.75Al0.25(OH)2)((CO3)0.125)

Powder Pattern (QM(I): Indexed, Calculated)
Radiation: CuKα1
λ: 1.5406 Å
Filter: 
Calibration: 
2θ: 145.495°
Lines: 56
RIR: 6.32
Reference: Zhitova, E. S., Krivovichev, S. V., Pekov, I., Greenwell, H. C., Mineral. Mag., v83 #2 p269 (2019)

Unit Cell Data (Single Crystal)
Crystal System: Hexagonal
S.G: R-3m (166)
Z: 3
P.S: hR5.5
Lattice Constants: 3.0728, 3.0728, 23.3260 (Å) <90.00°, 90.00°, 120.00°>
Volume: 190.74
Density: 1.737
Mwt: 66.49
F(30): 198.1 (0.0039,39/0)
Reference: Zhitova, E. S., Krivovichev, S. V., Pekov, I., Greenwell, H. C., Mineral. Mag., v83 #2 p269 (2019)

ANX: AB8X19. Analysis: C0.125 H2 Al0.25 Mg0.75 O2.375. Formula from original source: (Mg0.75 Al0.25 (O H)2) ((C O3)0.125). ICSD Collection Code: 133741. ICSD Keywords: Topology; Polytypism; Layered structures; Electron density distribution (EDD); Superstructure. Calculated Pattern Original Remarks: R = R(_refine_ls_R_factor_gt). Sample Source or Locality: Komsomol`skii Mine, Talnakh Cu-Ni deposit, Norilsk district, Krasnoyarsk Kray, Siberia, Russia. Temperature of Data Collection: 293 K (20°C). Minor Warning: 7%<R factor<12% (for single crystal). Wyckoff Sequence: g c2 a.
